definition.text: The Frontend is essentially a Javascript web-app running on the browser.

paragraphs.text: Canvas App: Most of the functionality is here. The name reflects the fact that most of the UI is rendered in an HTML 5 canvas object.
Files Component Includes the mechanisms to read data files in a way that is suitable for navigating through large datasets while plotting the information in real-time.
The UI was built entirely in-house. We did not reuse any framework to display the design space or the charts.
The UI is tested in Chrome only.
